channel.title: Green Beans on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Green Beans on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Green beans with walnuts
item.description: More recipes! This was a part of tonight's dinner. Oil for sauteing Garlic Walnuts, halves or pieces Green beans, trimmed Oregano Lemon juice Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Mince the garlic small, and add to the hot oil. Cook, stirring, until it smells great. Add the walnuts and stir fry until slightly browned or at least hot. Add the green beans and stir until coated with the oil.
